content:
# Factorio Report

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(6.5, 0.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Electric pole (position 6.5, 0.5)
- Electric pole (position 13.5, 10.5)
- Electric pole (position 14.5, 9.5)
- Electric pole (position 13.5, 12.5)
- Electric pole (position 10.5, 13.5)
- Electric pole (position 12.5, 13.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(-28.5, -61.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position -28.5, -61.5) and a furnace (position 0.0, 0.0)
- Burner mining drill (position -28.5, -61.5) and a furnace (position 2.0, 0.0)
- Burner mining drill (position -28.5, -61.5) and a furnace (position 2.0, 2.0)

### Furnace group at positions(0.0, 0.0), (2.0, 0.0), (2.0, 2.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position 0.0, 0.0) - Status: NO_INGREDIENTS, Fuel: 12
- Furnace (position 2.0, 0.0) - Status: FULL_OUTPUT, Fuel: 6
- Furnace (position 2.0, 2.0) - Status: NO_INGREDIENTS, Fuel: 20

### Wooden chest at position(5.5, 0.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Wooden chest (position 5.5, 0.5) - Inventory: {'iron-plate': 160}

### Lab at position(6.0, 0.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Lab (position 6.0, 0.0) - Status: NO_POWER, Research: automation

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to crafting and resource collection
- Ensure you have the necessary ingredients in your inventory before attempting to craft items or use machines.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors related to power supply
- Check that all structures requiring power are connected to an electricity source and that the source is functioning properly.
